summary:
Stephen: Tony, you're bleeding.
Tony: Oh that explains it.
Stephen: Explains what?
Tony: The stabbing pain in my side.

Stephen: Tony, you're bleeding.
Tony: Oh that explains it.
Stephen: Explains what?
Tony: The stabbing pain in my side.

blog.name: ageofendgame
blog.title: Some move on, but not us.
blog.description: just a girl who loves marvel

summary: Whatever you do, don’t imagine Tony sitting at the tower, looking blankly into his lap, thinking about those last few seconds...
body:
Whatever you do, don’t imagine Tony sitting at the tower, looking blankly into his lap, thinking about those last few seconds with Peter. The words playing back in his head, the feeling of Peter gripping onto him almost being recreated. Don’t think about Steve and the others being locked out of Tony’s life for weeks at a time because he couldn’t get over losing the boy he wanted to call son. Tony would finally open up to Steve and cry for hours at a time, regretting that he could never tell Peter he wanted to be his dad.


And most of all, don’t think about Peter looking up into darkness every day, wishing the person he adored most would come back.

Tony would finally open up to Steve and cry for hours at a time, regretting that he could never tell Peter he wanted to be his dad.


And most of all, don’t think about Peter looking up into darkness every day, wishing the person he adored most would come back.

trail.content_raw:
Whatever you do, don’t imagine Tony sitting at the tower, looking blankly into his lap, thinking about those last few seconds with Peter. The words playing back in his head, the feeling of Peter gripping onto him almost being recreated. Don’t think about Steve and the others being locked out of Tony’s life for weeks at a time because he couldn’t get over losing the boy he wanted to call son. Tony would finally open up to Steve and cry for hours at a time, regretting that he could never tell Peter he wanted to be his dad.


And most of all, don’t think about Peter looking up into darkness every day, wishing the person he adored most would come back.
trail.content:
Whatever you do, don’t imagine Tony sitting at the tower, looking blankly into his lap, thinking about those last few seconds with Peter. The words playing back in his head, the feeling of Peter gripping onto him almost being recreated. Don’t think about Steve and the others being locked out of Tony’s life for weeks at a time because he couldn’t get over losing the boy he wanted to call son. Tony would finally open up to Steve and cry for hours at a time, regretting that he could never tell Peter he wanted to be his dad.


And most of all, don’t think about Peter looking up into darkness every day, wishing the person he adored most would come back.

favourites: the world is my canvas
summary: me: idk, the way a vocal part of fandom says Tony/Stark Industries is completely guilty for every single thing that happens in...
body:
me: idk, the way a vocal part of fandom says Tony/Stark Industries is completely guilty for every single thing that happens in the movies, as always ignoring context and circumstance, is kind of an unnuanced reading of the text?

also me: EVERYTHING COMES BACK TO MY BABY, ONE WAY OR ANOTHER! ISN’T THAT GREAT?!?

summary: A Second Chance (To Get It Right)
title: A Second Chance (To Get It Right)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2uZbBoQ

by DobbyRocksSocks

Stephen knows there’s only one way to win the war against Thanos. Tony wishes he knew what the hell was happening, and just how he’s waking up in 2010 with JARVIS telling him the time and date.

blog.name: winterironbang
blog.title: Winteriron bang
blog.description:
Hello and welcome to the Winteriron Reverse Bang! For more information on the bang you can go to the FAQ page or the ask box. 
If you wish to join in or keep up with the bang you can follow this blog or track the winteriron bang tag.

summary: Reverse bang 2019
title: Reverse bang 2019
body:
Sorry for the long silence guys, the depression hit hard but I’m back now and ready for a new year full of your amazing work.

The new dates and signups have been posted but here are some shortcuts for you: Dates, Author signups, Artist signups

Taking into account the responses I’ve had this year we are hoping to coordinate both a reverse and a regular bang. The plan is to have the reverse bang spanning from April to July with posting occuring in August then a break and a regular bang spanning from October to February with posting happening in March.

Be sure to check out the rules and if you have any questions don’t hesitate to send an ask (you can also message but response times may be slower for these).

In addition you can join our discord here, where bang updates are posted and you can chat with other participants, there are also channels for fic recs or idea prompts for those who enjoy the bang but don’t want to participate.

Thanks and good luck xx

Taking into account the responses I’ve had this year we are hoping to coordinate both a reverse and a regular bang. The plan is to have the reverse bang spanning from April to July with posting occuring in August then a break and a regular bang spanning from October to February with posting happening in March.

Be sure to check out the rules and if you have any questions don’t hesitate to send an ask (you can also message but response times may be slower for these).

In addition you can join our discord here, where bang updates are posted and you can chat with other participants, there are also channels for fic recs or idea prompts for those who enjoy the bang but don’t want to participate.

Thanks and good luck xx

blog.name: i-love-tony-stark-3000
blog.title: MCU Lord and Saviour Tony Stark ⎊
blog.description: An Iron Man fan in mourning. Thank you, my darling. We'll all take care of Morgan for you. I love you 3000.

summary:
Either I'm a fucking idiot, or the cinema I bought Endgame tickets from fucked up.....Pretty sure I'm just an idiot.
I thought I...
body:
Either I’m a fucking idiot, or the cinema I bought Endgame tickets from fucked up…..Pretty sure I’m just an idiot.

I thought I had found tickets for Endgame the day before the release.

Turns out it’s just a rerun of Infinity War….not my brightest moment, I must admit.

So, I’m seeing Infinity War on the 23rd and Endgame on the 24th…..Not the worst outcome, I suppose…

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: True Friends
title: True Friends
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X2i2Dw

by Heckyheck_Icravedeath

James Rhodes is just your average tired high school student who never pays attention in class. Although one day he does because tests are a thing and that’s when he notices Tony Stark for the first time. His first thought is to befriend the kid and that’s what he does.

Words: 1462, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of The Adventures Of Tony and Rhodes

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Has A Heart, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark Friendship, tony stark is a little shit, James is too, lmao they both are, that’s why their friendship is so amazing, we love that - Freeform, this is like, the start of their friendship in my eyes, Tony hates it when people mention his height, James mentions his height anyway, because why not ?, Lmao I love them, besties for life, hell yeah, The Author Regrets Nothing, Author Is Sleep Deprived, :))


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X2i2Dw
